1.2.0.name: wordpress/bt-actve-discussions
1.2.0.description:
This is a recent comments plugin that displays customizable number of blog posts with recently updated comment. The output is very similar to phpBB's View Active Topics and vBulletin's Today's Posts functions.

You can see a demo at Moolanomy Personal Finance Blog and You can see a demo at Blogthority

Please send your feedback via Blogthority contact form

Special thank to Richard Strauss of My Zero Waste for contributing code prototype and idea for version 1.2.0.
